meanings.definition: The state or quality of being imperfect.
meanings.sent1: Her drawing showed some imperfectnesses in the lines.
meanings.sent2: The imperfectnesses in the design were noticeable to everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite the imperfectnesses, the painting still captured the essence of the scene.
meanings.sent4: The imperfectnesses in the plan were like cracks in a fragile vase.
meanings.sent5: The imperfectnesses of the sculpture gave it a unique charm.

meanings.sent4: The imperfectnesses in the diamond revealed its true nature.
meanings.sent5: The imperfectnesses of the book added character to its story.
